00039 class orb
00040 {
00041 private :
00042     
00043     vector<string> bs;
00044     double **psi;
00045     int NBasis; // the number of basis sets
00046     int read_orb_gauss(const char *);
00047     int read_orb_gamess(const char *);
00048     vector < pair<int, int> > _basis_on_atom;
00049     basis_set * _basis;
00050     vector<double> evl;
00051 
00052     double parsenrg(string & line);
00053 public:
00054     
00055     static int (orb::*read_orb)(const char *) ;
00056     orb (): psi(NULL), NBasis(0) {
00057         //psi=0; Basis=0;
00058     }
00059 
00060     void assign_basis_set ( basis_set * a, vector< pair <int, int> > b){
00061         _basis = a;
00062         vector < pair <int, int> >::iterator it;
00063         #ifdef DEBUG
00064         cout << "assigning pairs for so many atoms:" << b.size() <<endl;
00065         #endif
00066         for ( it = b.begin(); it != b.end() ; ++it){ 
00067             pair <int , int > beg_end(it->first, it->second);
00068             _basis_on_atom.push_back(beg_end);
00069         }
00070     }
00071     
00072     ~orb(){
00073         clear();
00074     }
00075 
00076 
00077     void clear(){
00078     //    cout << "call destructor for orb" <<endl;
00079         if (NBasis != 0 ){
00080             delete [] psi[0];
00081             delete [] psi;
00082         }
00083         NBasis =0;
00084         psi = 0;
00085         bs.clear();
00086         evl.clear();
00087         _basis_on_atom.clear();
00088     }
00089 
00090 
00091     inline const int & getNBasis() const {
00092         return NBasis;
00093     }
00094 
00095     inline double* getorb(const int & i) const {
00096         return psi[i];
00097     }
00098 
00099     inline double* getevl()  {
00100         return &evl[0];
00101     }
00102 
00103     void cp_orb( orb const  &A){
00104         for (int i=0; i < NBasis;i++) {
00105                 for (int j =0; j < NBasis ; j++){
00106                         psi[i][j] = A.psi[i][j];
00107                 }
00108         }       
00109     }
00110 
00111     void cp_orb( orb const &A, int const & i){
00112         for (int j =0; j < NBasis ; j++){
00113             psi[i][j] = A.psi[i][j];
00114         }
00115     }
00116 
00117     void init_orbitals (string * basis, const int & N, const char * namefile );
00118 
00119     void reorder_for_libint();

00121     void set_read_orb_gam();
00122 
00123     void set_read_orb_gauss();
00124     
00125     
00126     void init_orbitals (const orb & orb1 ){
00127         NBasis = orb1.NBasis;
00128         bs.resize(NBasis);
00129         psi = new double* [NBasis];
00130         psi[0] = new double [NBasis * NBasis];
00131         bs[0]=orb1.bs[0];
00132         for ( int i = 1 ; i < NBasis ; i ++){
00133                 bs[i] = orb1.bs[i];
00134                 psi[i] = psi[i-1] + NBasis;
00135         }
00136         for ( int i =0 ; i< NBasis*NBasis ; ++i) {
00137             *(psi[0]+i) = *(orb1.psi[0]+i);
00138         }
00139         evl.resize(NBasis);
00140     }
